text: The Fast Track Mahila Court Judge, J. Flora, on Tuesday issued witness warrant to Inspector of Police Nagarajan for his appearance on April 2. According to the Judge, the Inspector of Police is the investigation officer in a rape case reported in 2014 under the Meignanapuram police limits. He was then the Inspector of Meignanapuram police station and currently he was stationed in Tirupparankundram in Madurai. Twelve witnesses had been examined in connection with this rape case. Despite several summons issued to him, this investigating officer had not yet appeared in the Mahila court here and the case was pending only for the evidence of the investigating officer, she said.
title: Witness warrant issued
